content:
The table below shows the relationship between quiz scores and study time (in hours) for each student in Lucas's class.  

**Plot the data in a scatter plot.**  

|||||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: |
**Study time (hours)** | $1.75$ | $1.5$ | $0.5$ | $3$ | $3.25$ | $2$ 
**Score** | $17$ | $15$ | $7$ | $19$ | $20$ | $16$
